author: Salvatore Calabrese
description: Use a great quality white crème de cacao alongside Aqua Bianca and you'll have a surprisingly well-balanced complex and delicately chocolaty freshening after-dinner cocktail.
name: Ciao Bella
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
